程序包 com.ldzs.recyclerlibrary.adapter

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BaseViewAdapter<E>
    An abstract adapter which can be extended for RecyclerView create by cz on 2016/9/24

    An abstract adapter which can be extended for RecyclerView create by cz on 2016/9/24
    BaseViewHolder
    数据Holder对象
    CacheViewHolder
    数据Holder对象
    CursorRecyclerAdapter<H extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
    系统v4包内的ListView 的cursorAdapter,稍加修改.应用到RecyclerView上 CursorAdapter的自动查询功能.系统更建议使用ContentProvider+CursorLoader
